traits.name: Acne
traits.description: Active breakouts visible in T-zone with some comedones present on forehead and chin

traits.name: Oiliness
traits.description: Excess sebum production detected in T-zone area, contributing to shine

traits.name: Dryness
traits.description: Mild dry patches observed on cheek areas, indicating combination skin type

traits.name: Large Pores
traits.description: Enlarged pores visible on nose and cheeks, likely related to oil production

traits.name: Hyperpigmentation
traits.description: Minor post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation (PIH) marks from previous breakouts

notes: Consider incorporating a gentle BHA exfoliant 2-3 times per week to help with acne and pore appearance
Look for lightweight, non-comedogenic moisturizers that won't clog pores
SPF 30+ daily sunscreen is essential to prevent PIH marks from darkening
Niacinamide serums can help with oil control and pore appearance
